Name: Toggle light & dark theme
Description: Can I switch to light or dark theme in devtools?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: Open **Command** **Menu** (`Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+P`) & Run > "Switch to light/dark theme" (Appearance) > Press `Enter`.

Firefox.Notes: 1. Open **Settings** (`F1`) > Under the **Themes** section, select "Dark" or "Light" to switch themes.

Edge.Notes: Open **Command** **Menu** (`Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+P`) & Run > "Switch to light/dark theme" (Appearance) > Press `Enter`.

Safari.Notes: Open **Settings** (`Cmd+,`) > General > Appearance > Select "Dark" or "Light" to change the appearance.

Opera.Notes: Open **Command** **Menu** (`Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+P`) & Run > "Switch to light/dark theme" (Appearance) > Press `Enter`.

Polypane.Notes: Press `Cmd/Ctrl+I` or select "Toggle Dark Mode" in the "View" Menu.
